tool_description: Tracks and analyzes asset usage across different contexts including product pages, marketing campaigns, and other applications.

asset_id.description: Asset identifier to track usage for

usage_context.description: Where the asset is being used: product_page, category_page, search_results, email_campaign, or advertisement

page_url.description: URL where the asset is displayed

error_messages: Asset not found: The specified asset_id does not exist.
Invalid usage context: usage_context must be one of [product_page, category_page, search_results, email_campaign, advertisement].
Invalid URL format: page_url must be a valid HTTP(S) URL if provided.
Tracking failed: Usage information could not be recorded - check system connectivity.
usage: Record each instance of asset usage by providing the asset ID and usage context. Include additional context with page_url or campaign_id.

tracking_id.description: Unique identifier for this usage tracking entry

usage_count.description: Total usage count for this asset

first_used.description: Timestamp when asset was first used in ISO 8601 format

last_used.description: Timestamp when asset was last used in ISO 8601 format

popular_contexts.description: Most common usage contexts for this asset
